task.title: Creating a group
task.shortdesc: You can organize your contacts by placing them into groups.

context.p: After you create a group, you can add members. You can also add an individual contact as a group member.

step.cmd: From the contact list, tap the menu icon and select Add Group.
Select the type of group to create.
Enter a name for the group.
If you are creating a personal group and want to nest the new group within another group, turn on Make this group a subgroup. Then select the group to be the parent group.
If you are creating a public group, type the name of the group to add to your contact list and tap Search.

info.note: You can type a part of the name to search. From the search results, tap the name of the target group. In the box, tap Add.
